trans: ğŸŒŸ Another thing that I would like to share is that in the afternoon, a fan acted on her own and brought a cake to Ryuji on the stage and tried to hug him right on the stage. I would like to share that my page had prepared for the plan for a long time beforehand and discussed it with the organizing committee at length so that the present could be prepared for Ryuji in the morning. But in the afternoon, this fan showed up out of nowhere with a cake and rushed to the stage (I am quite certain that she did not discuss this with the organizing committee.). Afterwards, this fan came on the stage and confidently took photos with all 6 persons on stage and gave Ryuji a hug.
